author: SomeOrdinaryGamers
description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! In the last few days I spotted something a little interesting when it came to Assassin's Creed Shadows, it's DRM policy. With tech like Denuvo and anti-cheats so common is the idea of a Ubisoft game scanning your memory something you have to worry about? Most definitely not. Why? Let's talk about it. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Ubisoft Is Out Of Their Minds...
